title: Delegation of Certain Functions and Authorities under the Elie Wiesel Genocide and Atrocities Prevention Act of 2018 â€“ The White House
content:
Presidential Memoranda			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
June 16, 2020
The delegation in this memorandum shall apply to any provisions of any future public law that are the same or substantially the same as the provision referenced in this memorandum.The Secretary of State is authorized and directed to publish this memorandum in theFederal Register.
